actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Reported to House from the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service, H. Rept. 96-340.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.
Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary discharged in Senate.
Measure passed Senate, in lieu of S. J. Res. 99.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to provide for the designation of a week as "National Lupus Week".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the week of September 16 through 22, 1979, as "National Lupus Week."

titles.title: A joint resolution to provide for the designation of a week as "National Lupus Week".
